hero.title: BECOME VISIBLY FITTER, LEANER AND MORE ENERGETIC IN JUST 4 MONTHS WITH OUR BESPOKE 1:1 COACHING
hero.subtitle: For entrepreneurs & executives who are tired of overcrowded gyms, diets and training without results and finally want a system that fits into their daily life.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.paragraph1: Is creating a healthier society throughout every aspect of life: Personal and Business. We do that by delivering a higher standard in personal training experiences.
mission.paragraph2: Is blending innovative sport science with proven training methods, while providing your team members the space where they can live your company culture.

expectations.title: WHAT TO EXPECT?
expectations.subtitle: How a training session at New Health Society looks like

bullets.bullet1: Park in our private parking spots
bullets.bullet3: Meet your coach at the bar

bullets.bullet2: Pair up with a training partner
bullets.bullet3: Get a quick briefing on today's session

bullets.bullet2: Always supervised by at least one coach
bullets.bullet3: Full-body sessions every day for balanced, consistent progress

bullets.bullet1: Shower with fresh towels provided by New Health Society
bullets.bullet3: Ask your coach any questions about training or nutrition at the bar

clients.title: OUR CLIENTS
clients.subtitle: Leaders from these companies trust our coaching

challenges.title: Most entrepreneurs & executives realise too late what their body has been signalling for years.
challenges.subtitle: And this leads to the following problems.

cards.title: Lack of Energy
cards.description: Do you feel drained all day long? The battery is empty, but you still have to deliver.

cards.title: Fatigue
cards.description: Do you wake up as if you hadn't slept at all? The day starts already behind schedule.

cards.title: Packed Schedule
cards.description: You want to fit in exercise – but the day simply has no more room? Every week passes without progress.

cards.title: No Results
cards.description: You've tried everything – apps, plans, protein shakes – but nothing really changes your body?

cards.title: Countless Routines
cards.description: You've tried multiple times – but no routine sticks? Discipline doesn't fail you, the system does.

cards.title: Loss of Productivity
cards.description: Your lack of concentration and focus costs you several thousand euros per year.

promise.title: We build a personalised roadmap with you
promise.subtitle: A system that takes you to your goal step by step – measurable and predictable.
promise.body: Together we analyse where you stand, remove blockers and design a plan that works in your demanding schedule. Training, nutrition and recovery follow one clear structure.
promise.highlightSubtitle: We stay next to you until you arrive at your destination.

reviews.title: Do you recognise yourself in this? Then it's important that you understand one thing: the mistake is not yours!
reviews.subtitle: You've simply been missing a system that fits your life.
reviews.subtitle2: We develop an individual roadmap that takes you to your goal step by step.
reviews.missingApiKey: Please provide your Google API key.

experience.title: Experience unforgettable training with 100% individual support without waiting times & occupied equipment.

slides.title: Individually tailored training concept.
bullets: We place special emphasis on 1:1 support to help you reach your goal as quickly as possible.
Therefore, top-trained coaches are always by your side during your training, going through your individual training plan with you.

slides.title: Training in the most modern gym with the best equipment.
bullets: We want only the best for you!
Therefore, a fully equipped gym with state-of-the-art equipment awaits you.
You get everything you need from us.

slides.title: Top-trained coaches with years of experience.
bullets: An experienced trainer is by your side the whole time.
Whether with training exercises or nutrition plans.
With us, you are always in the best hands!

steps.title: Our 6-step plan for maximum success
steps.subtitle: A clear process guiding you from day one.

slides.title: 1 | INITIAL CONSULTATION
bullets: We take a close look at your situation, perform a mobility analysis and establish your common goals together.

slides.title: 2 | INDIVIDUAL TRAINING PLAN
bullets: We create your individual training plan. This is based on sports science principles and is continuously adjusted.

slides.title: 3 | ONE-ON-ONE TRAINING
bullets: You train with your coach in our exclusive studio. Our high-end equipment ensures maximum training success.

slides.title: 4 | PROGRESS CHECKS
bullets: Monthly check-ins document your development and ensure individual adjustments.

slides.title: 5 | NUTRITION & RECOVERY
bullets: We provide you with personalized nutrition recommendations, advise you on supplements and all essential nutrients during and after training. You don't have to worry about anything.

slides.title: 6 | ONGOING ADJUSTMENTS
bullets: To keep your progress going, we adjust your training and nutrition every three weeks. This allows us to optimize specific areas in training or nutrition.

transformations.title: We have already helped over 100 clients achieve their dream body and build more energy.
transformations.subtitle: These people stood exactly where you are now.

slides.title: Tilo, 56 – Body Fat Loss: 4% – Period: 5 Months
slides.text: With Coach Alex, he focused on protein intake, intensive strength training, and prioritizing recovery. The results paid off: Thilo is stronger, fitter, and back on his motocross bike without fear.
slides.quote: I never thought I'd get this fit at 50! Now my sons can barely keep up.

slides.title: Livius, 26 – Body Fat Loss: 7 KG – Period: 6 Months
slides.text: Like many young professionals, Livius struggled with irregular routines, low energy, and the feeling that fitness didn't fit into his life. With Coach Klemen, he learned the importance of progressive overload, restful sleep, and recovery.
slides.quote: Thanks to the group classes, I found a new routine that helped me get fit again.

slides.title: Florian, 30 – Muscle Gain: 5.2 KG – Period: 4 Months
slides.text: Florian felt too busy with work and social life to train. With Coach Alex, he found a routine of regular training, balanced nutrition, and sleep. Today he plays football weekly and is preparing for a marathon.
slides.quote: It felt like training in my own gym with friends – not just another workout, but a place where people really care.

facility.title: Train where results are created.
facility.subtitle: in our private 300 m² premium gym in the heart of Munich.
